title: Did Warren Buffett Suggest This Plan That Could Fix the Budget Deficit?
subtitle: Warren Buffett quipped about  passing a law that says anytime there is a deficit of more than 3% of GDP, all sitting members of Congress are ineligible for re-election.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Warren Buffett quipped that he could end the deficit by passing "a law that says anytime there is a deficit of more than 3% of GDP, all sitting members of Congress are ineligible for re-election.
